DOC.brief_title: Immediate Delayed Effects Kinesio Taping Neuromuscular Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty volunteer , female recruit randomly divide 3 group 20 member : control group ( CG ) - 10 minute rest ; placebo group ( PG ) - Kinesio Taping ( KT ) without application tension vastus lateralis ( VL ) , vastus ( VM ) rectus femoris ( RF ) ; Kinesio Taping group ( KTG ) - application KT tension VL , VM RF . All volunteer evaluate distance single triple hop test , postural balance ( baropodometry ) , joint position sense ( JPS ) , knee extensor torque ( concentric eccentric assessment 60 Â°/s ) electromyographic activity VL muscle five distinct stage : first intervention ( AV1 ) , second immediately ( AV2 ) follow three 24h ( AV3 ) , 48 ( AV4 ) intervention protocol . Soon AV4 , KT remove 24 hour take place last review ( AV5 ) .
DOC.criteria: Be recreationally active , history osteomyoarticular lesion surgery low limbs previous six month , noncorrected neurological , vestibular , visual and/or hearing impairment , addition display allergy adhesive material . Individuals experience pain collection procedure perform exercise instructed researcher would exclude .
